graph.tree.bc

Class BCTree<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.elements.Graph<BCTreeNode,BCTreeEdge>
      • graph.tree.bc.BCTree<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The vertex type
    E - The edge type

    public class BCTree<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>
extends Graph<BCTreeNode,BCTreeEdge>
    Class represents a block-cut vertex tree and contains methods for its construction given a separable graph Let B be the set of blocks and C be the set of cut vertices of a separable graph G. Construct a graph H with vertex set B U C in which adjacencies are defined as follows: ci in C is adjacent to bj in B if and only if the block bj of G contains the cut vertex ci of G
    Author:
    Renata
